titles.title: Pilot Protection Act of 2005
Pilot Protection Act of 2005
To amend title 18, United States Code, with respect to interfering with the operation of an aircraft.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary: Pilot Protection Act of 2005 - Amends the federal criminal code to prohibit: (1) interfering with or disabling anyone engaged in the authorized operation of an aircraft or air navigation facility, with intent to endanger the safety of any person or with reckless disregard for the safety of human life; or (2) attempting, conspiring, or threatening to do so.
